description: Dashboard for Micrometer and influx DB instrumented applications that are persisted in Influx DB (Java, Spring Boot)

targets.query: SELECT mean("value")  / 1024/1024 FROM "jvm_memory_used" WHERE ("application" =~ /^$Application$/ AND "environment" =~ /^$Environment$/ AND "area" = 'heap') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(5s) fill(null) ORDER BY time DESC
SELECT mean("value") FROM "jvm_memory_used" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

title: JVM & DB Metrics (Micrometer)
